"What? Naked?" You blush and nod, still hiding yourself. "You don't have to be embarrassed, we're dating remember" She smiled and while that did make you feel a little better, you still felt odd being naked around her. Not that you haven't wanted to be but... in those fantasies you were still normal height.

"Still.. it... feels odd" You confess. She nods in acknowledgement and keeps her cute smile on you.

"So, you were saying?"

"Hm? O-oh yeah... Well... I woke up and.. I was surrounded by my clothes. Once I got out of them I .... uhm...."Your face went dark red as you recall seeing not only your girlfriend naked, but her friends and peers as well "I... saw you and.. the other girls naked." She laughs at this and smiles down at you. "W-what?" You call up to her "What's so funny"

"You!" She responds, "You're all embarrassed and it makes you even cuter, though.... we do have to talk about your little peeper session before we found you." She says glaring playfully at you. You chuckle a bit trying to enjoy the situation as well.

"Yeah... I think i wandered into the wrong locker room before I shrank." Catie nods her head

"Yeah, new students seem to have trouble with that" She smiles and lowers her hand to you and pokes your belly, nearly pushing you down.

"Y-yeah." Catie seeing you ended your story decides to start another conversation.

"So you okay? You enjoy your little... punishment?~" She says with a grin. She smiles, giggles and winks at you. Honestly you had chosen to forget about it even though it happened no more than a few hours ago.

"W-well... f-for the most part it wasn't.... so bad" Catie giggles

"I'm glad you liked it." Part of you started to become concerned now. She and the other girls were waaay too comfortable with finding you shrunken and toying with you. What was the deal with that?

"Hey Catie?"

"Yes, Why were you and the other girls so calm about finding me... erm.. a tiny.. like me and toying with him." Her smiles fades... then reappears.

"Well Cory~..."
1423232.title: Just wanted to talk to you for a bit

15.content:
You were apparently at an amusement park, specifically a fun house. You were next to the wall, so you probably didn't have to worry about people (For now). You tried to remember what happened. The way you remembered it was you were in the fun house and saw a door that said "DO NOT ENTER!" Since you were curious, you had gone in. It looked like an empty room, so you turned to leave when suddenly, a clown girl appeared in front of you. That was all you could remember.

You decided to move forward for now. As you moved, you were careful to avoid children. Unfortunately, as you were avoiding one, you fell down a slide. The slide was especially long for you because of your size. When you got to the bottom, you had a rough landing in a ball pit. Just before you could move, a child landed on you, pushing you deeper. You quickly grabbed onto her shirt, hoping to get out of this bottomless pit.

After about 5 minutes, the child finally climbed out and you fell to the hard surface.
"Finally, maybe we can get somewhere now." You say to yourself. Suddenly, you see someone in front of you. You run over to them, hoping it was someone you knew. When you got to their foot, you saw that it was . . .
15.title: Curiosity shrinks the human

choices: Pretend to follow and find a way to enter
151.content:
"Thank god! It's Mom. I am saved. I have to scream. MOOOOM.MOOOOOOM."

The noise and the music is too loud. Angie couldn't hear you. Her foot is going to leave. You jump inside Angie's sandal and land at the center of it. She steps on you and moves to the portable toilet. It's sweaty and warm underneath Angie's feet.

"This cannot get any worse."

She enters inside the bathroom and sits. She takes her sandal off and sees her barefeet.

"I see... Cory. I never thought that you would be in my feet."

"You are taking this extremely lighty......What is going on?"

"I will tell you.. The door that you went through....Was made by me."

"WHAT THE?! WHY?"

"I wanted you to be tiny. So you can fulfill your ordeal. You are the only one I can rely on."

"What are you even talking about?! Are you drunk again?"

"No Corey. That clown girl qas paid by me to shrink you. Since I rely someone like you in that size."

"I don't understand at all."

"You will Corey. Down the hatch."

Angie opens her mouth.

"MOOOOM. NOOOOOOOOOOOOO-"

She swallows you.

"Good luck Corey."

You land at Angie's stomach.But much to your suprise. You see an funfair and people inside Angie's stomach. It even has a red sky.

"WHAT THE FUCK IS GOING ON?! A CIRCUS INSIDE MY MOM'S STOMACH, PEOPLE ARE THERE. IT DOESN'T MAKE ANY SENSE!"

You move to the circus and you meet the mascot. A teddy bear.

"I have been expecting you Corey."

"What the?! What is happening here. What is this place doing here in my mother's stomach?"

"The short version is. Angie is a demigod from another world. She can create life inside her body. You are here to find a paraside that tries to suck her energy. You are the only one to stop it."

"Maaaan. She is a demigod and I had no idea. No wonder, despite her age, she looks beautiful. That makes sense....But still, I have to take care a parasite. Why me?"

"Only someone from her bloodline can survive inside her body. Any human intruder who dares to enter, are instanly being killed by her toxic air."

"Ooooookay......This is so convoluted."

"Less talk and focus on your objective."

"But I have one more thing. How can I return back to normal?"

"You will find out eventually. Now go."

You move inside the circus and try to find the parasite. After an hour has passed. You stop and sit down. Then you see the parasyte. It's a cockroach. It sees you and it flies towards to you. You run towards a tent and hide. You see a lance and grab it. The cockroach arrives and destroy the tent. You begin to fight it. Suddenly, it rains. You have a taste and it's coca cola. The acid begins to create tsunamis and it's coming at you. It destroys half of the circus. But it regenerates back to normal. You stabs at the left wing and the cockroach lands down. It gets angry and tries to attack you. You have an idea. You run near the acid and bubbles are slowly made.

"Come at me!"

It comes at you and you hit it until it fails down the acid. The acid pulls it and it went inside the bubble. Angie burbs and the cockroach is out. She steps on it.

"Good job Cory. Mommy is proud of you."

The acid creates a tsunami and hits the entire circus. You are caught inside the tsuname and it leads you to a hole that leads to the bladder.

"There you are my sweet boy. Inside my bladder. Let's see what you are going to do."

"Oh boy.....It stinks....Why am I here for?"

"Hey there."

"Teddy bear...What are you doing here?"

"I am here to be released from my misery and head to paradise."

"Dude.....We are in my mother's bladder.. There is no paradise."

"But you will be fine. My creator confirms it."

"I need to leave before it gets worse."

You swim and you see an exit. Angie puts a bottle and takes her underwear. She begins to pee.

"OH NOOO-"

You are pulled over and land inside the bottle. Angie is done.

"Congrats for taking care of the paraside."

"Soooo.....How can I be back to normal?"

"There is only one way to be back."

"Can you tell me?"

"You have to go back to my womb and be reborn again."

"You are kidding me."

"No, I am not."

"Then, allow me to enter."

"Not a chance."

"What?"

"You will be like that for the rest of the day."

"No way."

She grabs you.

"Yes you are. Follow my orders and things will be great."

What are you going to do?
151.title: Your mother (Angie)

choices: Suddenly turned around;her foot is raised right over you!
She spots something on the floor:You!
She finishes and walks right over you
155.content:
As you stared up at the huge pair of shoes that looked strange,very strange "What the heck is that? What kind of shoes are those?" You thought as you glanced up at the bright red almost firetruck colored clown shoes.....wait clown shoes? You questionably stared up at the gigantic girl about 16 or was it 17 dressed in a bizarre clown outfit.

The teenaged girl was basically at the amusement park to of course entertain kids and such but in reality making balloon animals and funny faces all day was a bit boring and got old but she needed the extra money for her summer job still she wished something exciting would happen and it turned out she just so got her wish when she headed into the girls' restroom to rub off some of the clown makeup she had no idea that you had secretly followed her in there hoping to get some giant support.

You tiptoed as quietly as you could behind the gigantic girl in bizarre makeup feeling a bit like Elmer Fudd hunting Bugs Bunny in the woods although you thought it would have been simply better just to hitch a ride on one of her shoes but nonetheless you were a mere 3 feet away from the giantess still scrubbing the makeup off of her face which by all means was actually very attractive and as you sought to think of a way to get her attention the girl.....
155.title: The clown girl from before

info.brief_description: Life gets a little more difficult when you're seen as an object.
info.description:
One day you find yourself shrunk (2-6inches tall) and have to try to survive the many perils that await.

You: Cory/ 19/5' 10"/ average build.

Family....

Angie: Mother / 40 / 5'7" / D cup.

Marissa: Sister/ 18/ 5'9"/ C cup/ slender body but a plump ass / "punk" lifestyle / Usually get along but you occasionally tease her (typical sipping stuff) which she doesn't appreciate.

Gage: Brother/ 18/ 5'11" / athletic build / almost always out with his girlfriend or friends but on the rare occasion he's home he stays in his room to himself


Friends:

Catie: girlfriend/ 20/ 5'9" / a little on the thick side/ D cup / big round ass / easy to get along with but arguments also come easy / you tease her about the size of her feet all the time.

Dalton: 21 / 6'2" / slender athletic build/ best friend since grade school.

Sierra: Gage's girlfriend / 17 / 5'10" / smaller girl / B cup / you two don't get along very well.

Renee: your ex / 21 / 6'3" / DD Cup / thick body and legs / big feet / things didn't end well considering you're the one who left her.

Erik: 20 / 6'4" / average build / friends since middle school

Amanda: Eriks girlfriend / 19 / 5'9" / B Cup / pale skin / red hair/ loves to joke around

Kara: Daltons ex / 18 / 5'10" / C cup / also pale skinned / long legs firm ass / kinda has a thing for you.

Alicia: 18 / 5'8" / thicker woman / DD cup

Maggie:19 / 5'11"/ D Cup / thick round ass / you two use to have a thing and you still have a crush on her.

Kellie and katelyn: Maggie's friends

Ashley and Jessie : caties friends

This story is yours as much as it is mine so add away!

Feel free to add almost anything. I've never had to delete a chapter before so I'm pretty lenient. Anything goes. GP will be given out for any additions the better the chapter the more GP. Enjoy!
info.pretty_title: Shrunk Around Friends/Family GP for Adds
